name: Reminders
description: Display bin collection reminders and custom reminders

config.title: Reminders Settings
config.description: Configure your bin collection service details and custom reminders

fields.label: API Endpoint
fields.description: The API endpoint for your council's bin collection service

fields.label: Custom Reminders
fields.description: Configure custom reminders with specific times, days, text, and icons

itemFields.label: Reminder Text
itemFields.description: The text to display for this reminder

itemFields.label: Icon
itemFields.description: Icon name (available: milk, bell, calendar, clock, home, shopping-cart, utensils, package, heart, star, check-circle, alert-circle, trash)

itemFields.label: Days of Week
itemFields.description: Comma-separated days (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, 2=Tuesday, 3=Wednesday, 4=Thursday, 5=Friday, 6=Saturday). Leave empty for all days.

itemFields.label: Start Hour
itemFields.description: Hour to start showing reminder (0-23). Leave empty for start of day.

itemFields.label: End Hour
itemFields.description: Hour to stop showing reminder (0-23, exclusive). Leave empty for end of day.
